casebody.data:
Frederick R. WHEELER and Marilyn Wheeler, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
CITY OF LIVONIA, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158910
COA: 338704 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 25, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before March 1, 2019.
